pages.text: Do not grief player bases, shops or spawn just for fun. This will most likely result in a ban.

HOWEVER, if your base or build $(bold)is not claimed$() and someone griefs or steals from you, that is $(bold)on you.$() I have given more than enough resources to show you how to claim. If you did not read here or the BaerCraft Servers book, that's your fault for not reading and we will most likely not reimburse you.
